Summer Immersive 2014

Classes Instructors Students Schedule

Classes / Week 1: Web Skills

Taught by Shawn Allen & Matt Ganucheau

Course Description

This class will teach you just enough about web technology to be dangerous, from authoring your own HTML and CSS to version control and hosting with GitHub.

Software Used

  • Atom
  • GitHub

Resources Referenced

  • Shay Howe: Building Your First Web Page
  • MDN HTML5 element reference
  • MDN CSS Guide
  • Learn Layout
  • A List Apart: HTML

June 17th (6pm - 9pm)

Tonight we took a shotgun approach and covered a lot of stuff:

  • What is the web? DNS, HTTP, and URLs
  • Web standards and browsers
  • The basics of HTML
    • Element syntax
    • Document structure
    • Common HTML5 elements and their uses
  • An introduction to GitHub
    • creating a personal page with GitHub Pages
    • using the static site generator
    • syncing code with the native app for Mac and Windows
  • The Atom text editor

Check out the slides on your own time, and get in touch if you have any questions!

Suggested Reading

  • Shay Howe: Building Your First Web Page
  • MDN HTML5 element reference
  • A List Apart: HTML articles

June 19th (6pm - 9pm)

Tonight we dove deep into CSS and tricked out our personal GitHub pages. Here are some of the topics covered:

  • HTML images and SVG
  • Using CSS Deck to prototype HTML & CSS
  • Cascading Style Sheets
    • Why CSS: separating substance (content) from style (presentation), and the cascade
    • CSS syntax: selectors, properties, @media
    • CSS properties for controlling text, layout and display
    • Units (AKA <length>): px, %, em, rem, vw and vh
    • CSS colors: named, hexadecimal, RGB, and HSL
    • Positioning with position and float
    • Descendant and pseudo-selectors
    • CSS transitions and animation
  • Project setup, file structure, and naming conventions
  • Creating files and folders using Atom
  • Using the Chrome Web Inspector
  • Live coding tools:
    • CSS Deck
    • CodePen
    • Tributary
    • JSFiddle

Check out the slides, and I'll see you in 2 weeks for the JavaScript course!

Further Reading

  • MDN CSS Guide
  • Learn Layout
  • CSS Tricks Almanac
  • * { box-sizing: border-box; } FTW
  • A Complete Guide to Flexbox
  • A List Apart: Understanding Progressive Enhancement
  • More CSS articles on A List Apart

June 21st (12pm - 6pm)

Review: HTML & CSS

Review: Github

  • Cloning a site from github
  • Creating a page using github pages generator

Intro to Bootstrap

  • What is a framework?
  • Alternative Frameworks - Styleguide & Boilerplate Patterns (googleDoc)
